Package ccre.ctrl

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IJoystick
    A joystick that provides channels for all of its inputs.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BooleanMixing
    BooleanMixing is a class that provides a wide variety of useful static methods to accomplish various common actions primarily relating to boolean channels.
    DriverImpls
    Contains various presets for driving the robot.
    EventMixing
    EventMixing is a class that provides a wide variety of useful static methods to accomplish various common actions primarily relating to event channels.
    ExpirationTimer
    An ExpirationTimer acts sort of like an alarm clock.
    ExtendedMotor
    Sometimes there's more to control about a motor than just a power level, and so FloatOutput is insufficient.
    FloatMixing
    FloatMixing is a class that provides a wide variety of useful static methods to accomplish various common actions primarily relating to float channels.
    FloatOperation
    A FloatOperation provides a generic operation that takes two Float values as inputs.
    Mixing
    Mixing is a class that provides a wide variety of useful static methods to accomplish various common actions using channels, that don't fall into the existing categories of EventMixing, FloatMixing, or BooleanMixing.
    MultipleSourceBooleanController
    A controller that combines a series of registered BooleanOutputs or BooleanInputs to create a single output or input line.
    PauseTimer
    A PauseTimer has a boolean state for running or not, which is readable but not directly writable.
    PIDControl
    A generic PID Controller for use in CCRE applications.
    SerialOutputStream
    Wraps a SerialOutput in an OutputStream so that it can be used with infrastructure designed for OutputStreams.
    Ticker
    An EventInput that will fire the event in all its consumers at a specified interval.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ExtendedMotor.DiagnosticType
    The different possible diagnostics for an ExtendedMotor to provide.
    ExtendedMotor.OutputControlMode
    The different possible output control modes for an ExtendedMotor to provide.
    ExtendedMotor.StatusType
    The different possible status types for an ExtendedMotor to provide.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ExtendedMotorFailureException
    An exception thrown when an ExtendedMotor cannot complete the requested operation.
